Andy

Korean: 앤디

Hometown:

Los Angeles, California

Andy Toshihide Okuda

Group (2024-present):
ARrC

Introduction

Andy is a member of the South Korean boy group ARrC under MYSTIC Story. He is known for participating in the survival show, PROJECT 7.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7, which started in October 2024. He was eliminated in the final after ranking 19th place.

On January 30th, 2025, MYSTIC STORY announced that Andy joined ARrC as a new member and ARrC would continue as a 7-member group.
